name: Flowing Rings
title: Enthralling Tales Passed On: Flowing Rings
desc: "...And the stone that had been lost to the waters may have been a lesser jade, or perhaps just a simple cup. Some even say that the "jade" in the tale is in fact an analogy for a beautiful person."
inPlayDescription: After the character uses a Normal Attack: Draw 1 card. (Once per Round)

skills.desc: After the character uses a Normal Attack: Draw 1 card. (Once per Round)(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
